I know it's a little desperate, but two immediate reblogs make me a little happy. I'm just hoping that people will actually _donate_ and not just bat the post around to say "lol look at what a good person I am".

-I know that's bitter, some people can't donate and just want to give exposure to a cause. But you know there are people like that.-
